prompts: Create a humanoid Pokemon with purple skin and a long blonde hair.
Imagine a powerful ice-type Pokemon that has a striking red dress and unique features.
Show me a unique Pokemon that blends elements of ice and psychic types with a captivating appearance.
Generate a character design for a quirky Pokemon with elegant hair and a bright dress.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a performer, complete with a colorful outfit and expressive stance.
Design an intriguing Pokemon that stands out with its dual ice and psychic abilities.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies grace with its flowing dress and enchanting persona.
